title: How tier 3 colleges mislead parents and students with utter garbage
selftext:
Anyone working in tech or doing btech will know whatever she is saying is utter nonsense. She leveraged github bootstrapped value added programs using html css ai ml.
This ad is produced to sell a dream to gullible students and parents. How easy these colleges think it's easy to take for a ride innocent people.
